resources.string:
Terms and Conditions
The hiring charges of a bicycle is Rs 10 which will be valid for 12 hrs* One should pay Rs 300 to hire a cycle which will be valid for 1 month* If there is any damage or loss of a bicycle during the hiring period, the one who has hired the cycle has to bear the cost. Bicycles can also be hired for short period of time on emergency basis. People can rent out their bicycles , they will be paid according to the period of rent.
*the prices are subjected to change according to availability and demand.
